subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox have sent their top three sluggers back to Boston for medical tests, with Manny Ramírez and Wily Mo Peña heading east on Tuesday to join David Ortiz.
snippet: The Red Sox have sent their top three sluggers back to Boston for medical tests, with Manny Ramírez and Wily Mo Peña heading east on Tuesday to join David Ortiz.
